about_the_game:
Get ready for an exciting adventure in the epic tank battles.

Jump into your tank and plunge into the fierce tank battles!

You will have to fight on modern technology. Pumping begins with combat vehicles of the mid-20th century, and the latest tanks become available at the last levels!

Improve your tank to become stronger than your rivals!

Invite your friends and play with them ABSOLUTELY FOR FREE!

specifications :

• Dynamic tank battles, solid action with no time for respite.

• Many systems for the development and pumping of your tank.

• Lots of camouflage and drawings.

• Multiple battle arenas.

• Intuitive operation.

• Daily combat quests, for which you can get bonuses to strengthen your tank.

• The ability to choose any game mode: team or individual.

• A general chat that allows you to communicate with the players of your country.

Join our fan communities:

Be aware of the newest updates!

Take part in gaming tournaments, take first place in the ranking!

Fill your life with thrills, start your battle!

Jump into your tank and prove to everyone who you are! Until you accept the fight, you won't know...

Tanks, tanks and more tanks!

A PERMANENT INTERNET CONNECTION IS REQUIRED.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS, Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 630 or similar (2GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 630 or similar (2GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Modern Tanks: War Tank Games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Quad Q6600 & AMD Athlon II X4 640 AM3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon RX 460 or Intel HD 630 (2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Get ready for an exciting adventure in the epic tank battles. Pump up combat vehicles of the mid-20th century, and the latest tanks like Leopard 2, T-90, Abrams, the legendary T-14 ""Armata"" and other classified novelties become available at the last levels!

English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian*, Japanese
